description.zh-cn: 台湾重金属创作歌手、政治人物，现任中华民国驻芬兰代表。为闪灵乐团创始团员与主唱，曾任中华民国立法委员、时代力量创党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese heavy metal singer-songwriter and politician, currently serving as the Representative of the Republic of China to Finland. He is a founding member and lead vocalist of the band Chthonic, a former member of the Legislative Yuan, and the founding chairman of the New Power Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政党，由林昶佐等人于2015年创立。

description.en: A Taiwanese politician, DPP legislator, and Freddy Lim's cousin.

description.en: A recall election targeting Legislator Freddy Lim, which ultimately failed as the number of 'yes' votes did not meet the required threshold.

description.en: Freddy Lim's maternal grandfather, a victim of the February 28 Incident.

description.en: A violent conflict in Taiwan in 1947 between government officials and civilians, resulting in numerous casualties.

description.en: Freddy Lim is one of the founding members of the New Power Party and served as its first chairman.

description.zh-cn: 林昶佐曾任时代力量党主席，于2019年8月1日退党。
description.en: Freddy Lim served as the chairman of the New Power Party and left the party on August 1, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 时任民主进步党主席的赖清德引荐林昶佐加入民进党。
description.en: Lai Ching-te, then chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party, recommended Freddy Lim to join the DPP.

description.zh-cn: 林昶佐于2023年11月27日正式加入民主进步党。
description.en: Freddy Lim officially joined the Democratic Progressive Party on November 27, 2023.

description.zh-cn: 总统赖清德任命林昶佐为中华民国驻芬兰代表。
description.en: President Lai Ching-te appointed Freddy Lim as the Representative of the Republic of China to Finland.

description.zh-cn: 林昶佐自2025年7月20日起担任中华民国驻芬兰代表。
description.en: Freddy Lim has served as the Representative of the Republic of China to Finland since July 20, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 林昶佐于2016年至2024年间担任第九、十届中华民国立法委员。
description.en: Freddy Lim served as a member of the 9th and 10th Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China from 2016 to 2024.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年立法委员选举中，林昶佐作为时代力量候选人击败了寻求连任的国民党籍候选人林郁方。
description.en: In the 2016 legislative election, Freddy Lim, as the New Power Party candidate, defeated the incumbent KMT candidate Lin Yu-fang.

description.zh-cn: 林昶佐放弃连任后，担任吴沛忆竞选总部的主任委员，帮助其顺利当选，接棒自己的立委席位。
description.en: After giving up his re-election bid, Freddy Lim served as the campaign director for Wu Pei-yi, helping her win the election and succeed his legislative seat.

description.zh-cn: 林昶佐与闪灵乐团团长叶湘怡（Doris）为夫妻关系。
description.en: Freddy Lim and Doris Yeh, the leader of the band Chthonic, are married.
